summary: A re-texture of ebony and steel for a true paladin armor.
descriptionHtml:
A re-texture of ebony and steel for a true paladin armor.

This mod replaces the textures of the steel plate helmet, ebony armor & shield, and Dawnbreaker.

Warning: It shines VERY bright in the sunlight.

Installation: Drag the data folder into your /skyrim/ directory.

Uninstallation: Delete the following folders from your texture folder : 
ebonyarmor nordplate dawnbreaker ebony

Mod note: I will be making this into a standalone myself. Can\'t say when it\'ll be done because I\'ve never used a modding tool before. If someone wants to help if I\'m having trouble, shoot me a message. I\'d appreciate it.

As of now there will be no female version.
author: WhoAteTheRamen
